title: Best of The Herd: 08/29/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/29/2018
description:
Colin's new favorite player is Malcolm Jenkins because he is the only player on the Eagles not focused on last season's accomplishment. He thinks Hard Knocks has made the Browns look extremely bad. Plus, Super Bowl Champion and former Defensive Player of the Year James Harrison comes in studio to talk about Aaron Rodgers getting a new deal and why he hates Hard Knocks. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
